reviewText: A pretty nice expansion pack/DLC although,the dinosaur choice is kind of meh because they only have ten dinosaurs and one giant turtle called archelon. The upside to the DLC is the missions, the missions were actually fun ecspecially the one where you had to rescue the dinosaurs from the military. All in all this is a great expansion pack for an awesome game (even though there isn't alot to it).

reviewText:
the first mission is broken, you can't even start the first step of the first mission to progress. that and many models, maps, and textures where Never completed. this is basicly your Zoo Tycoon Clone that is trying to hook you in with Dinosaurs. the only good thing it has is the freeplay or Sandbox mod. but even that shares some glitches and issues.

If you want a park builder simulator game, get Jurassic Park: Operation Genesis for XBOX, PC, and PS2. it's way better then this, and it was made back in 2002!

Wildlife Park 2 - Dino World, Just pass it
